overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "Bronc Rider" — Bert Edwards and handsome stud Mandingo, plus Greg Kolb...breaking horses and each other. They ride...they're ridden. A total masculine sex rodeo. "Manhandler" — Michael Delfino, a young stud, and Dirk, the manhandler...fulfilling all of Michael's fantasies. "We Deliver" — Don's wife is out and he's ready for a break from the dull routine...an opportunity to exert his masculinity leads to the delivery boy getting a big tip! "Bodywork" — Muscle stud Dirk puts Rod through an intensive training session...unlimited thrusts. "Please Knock Before Entering" — Ken, the coach; Kirk, the state swim champ; Tom, Kirk's buddy...the coach catches our two buddies and gets a two-for-one bargain with the coach calling the shots.
title: Bronc Rider
